description.narrative:
PEACH aims to support sub-national governments to improve their capacity to better utilize their increased responsibility and fiscal resources through various activities within the following components:
1. Production of Public Expenditure Analysis (PEA) reports, which also serves as a mean to strengthen the local research teams
2. Sub-national and national government capacity building program (trainings and TAs), which include: a. training and TAs on PFM for sub-national government as well as the relevant staff of the Ministry of Home Affairs (MOHA) b. TAs to MOHA on (i) the revision of the Minister of Home Affairs Regulation No. 65/2007 on Local Budget Evaluation and (ii) the development of the guidelines for the implementation of Government Regulation No. 71/2010 on Government Accounting Standard
3. Communications and outreach delivered by Yayasan Bakti, including: organising PEA launch, conference, News Café discussion series, PFM seminars for CSOs/media, media monitoring
